column2: Traffic;Phnom Penh:  ------In early morning of September 29
column4: a man driving a Corolla  taxi bounced up ------on the divider along Russian Federation road in Sras Chak district
column5: Daun Penh district.------The taxi had transported a woman tourist (whether she was still in the car is unclear).------The road divider was not damaged
column6: while the car was. The driver suffered minor injuries and had his license handed over to the Capital Road Negotiations Office Phnom Penh
